p: Western blotting was performed as previously described ( 8). The primary antibodies used were rabbit anti-human hNTCP polyclonal antibody (cat. no. HPA042727; Sigma-Aldrich; Merck KGaA; dilution 1:1,000), and mouse anti-human Î²-actin monoclonal antibody (cat. no. 60008-1-Ig Proteintech Group, Inc.; dilution 1:1,000). The secondary antibodies used were HRP-conjugated Affinipure Goat Anti-Rabbit IgG(H+L) (cat. no. SA00001-2; Proteintech Group, Inc.; dilution 1:5,000), HRP-conjugated Affinipure Goat Anti-Mouse IgG(H+L) (cat. no. SA00001-1; Proteintech Group, Inc.; dilution 1:5,000).
